existR 0.0.1
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Getting started

Reference

Authentication

Authenticate a user to Exist.io

exist_auth()

Authenticate to Exist.io

User information

Get information on the logged in user.

exist_profile()

Query Exist.io current user

exist_today()

Query Exist.io current users day

Attributes

Get data about attributes.

exist_multiple_attributes()

Query Exist.io for multiple attributes

exist_specific_attribute()

Query Exist.io for a specific attribute

Insights

Get data about insights.

exist_all_insights()

Query Exist.io for all insights

exist_attribute_insights()

Query Exist.io for all insights for a specific attribute

Averages

Get data about averages.

exist_current_averages()

Query Exist.io for the most recent averages.

exist_attribute_averages()

Query Exist.io for all averages for a specific attribute

Correlations

Get data about correlations.

exist_attribute_correlations()

Query Exist.io for all correlations for a specific attribute

exist_strongest_correlations()

Query Exist.io for the strongest correlations across all attributes.

Attribute ownership

Change attribute ownership

exist_acquire_attribute()

Acquire ownership for an attribute on Exist.io

exist_release_attribute()

Release ownership for an attribute on Exist.io

exist_owned_attributes()

Query Exist.io for the owned attributes

Updating data

Update data

exist_update_attribute()

Update an attribute on Exist.io

exist_append_tag()

Append a tag on Exist.io

Internal Functions

Internal functions needed by the package.

exist_package_query()

Query Exist.io API

exist_package_useragent()

existR user agent

Print Functions

Print functions for the api functions.

print(<exist_acquire_attribute>)

Print result of exist_acquire_attribute()

print(<exist_all_insights>)

Print result of exist_all_insights()

print(<exist_append_tag>)

Print result of exist_append_tag()

print(<exist_attribute_averages>)

Print result of exist_attribute_averages()

print(<exist_attribute_correlations>)

Print result of exist_attribute_correlations()

print(<exist_attribute_insights>)

Print result of exist_attribute_insights()

print(<exist_current_averages>)

Print result of exist_current_averages()

print(<exist_multiple_attributes>)

Print result of exist_multiple_attributes()

print(<exist_owned_attributes>)

Print result of exist_owned_attributes()

print(<exist_profile>)

Print result of exist_profile()

print(<exist_release_attribute>)

Print result of exist_release_attribute()

print(<exist_specific_attribute>)

Print result of exist_specific_attribute()

print(<exist_strongest_correlations>)

Print result of exist_strongest_correlations()

print(<exist_today>)

Print result of exist_today()

print(<exist_update_attribute>)

Print result of exist_update_attribute()
